title: Re-sale By Owner At Capitol Twin Peaks
details: Specialist In Re-sales In Prominent Developments Capitol Twin Peaks Apartments Tower 1 B1 Units With Un-obstructed View (837 Sqft) Tower 2 B3 Units With Un-obstructed View (770 Sqft/913 Sqft) On High Floors, With Breathtaking Views, Two Bed Roomed Unit With Two Bathrooms, Hall, Dining Fitted Pantry, Balcony & Dedicated Parking. Other Features Include Swimming Pool, Gym, Sky Launge. Prices Range From Us$ 260,000 Rs 40.5 Million To Us$ 320,000 Rs 50 Million The Units Come With A Payment Plan The Building Will Be Ready For Occupation By December 2020
